statements: SELECT * FROM shards;
SELECT shard_name, shard_location FROM shards WHERE shard_id = 1;
SELECT shard_name, shard_location FROM shards WHERE partition_key = 100 ORDER BY shard_name DESC;
SELECT shard_id, shard_name FROM shards WHERE shard_location <> 'USA' ORDER BY shard_id;
SELECT COUNT(shard_id) AS total_shards FROM shards;
SELECT * FROM shards WHERE shard_location = 'New York';
SELECT shard_name, shard_location FROM shards WHERE shard_id = 3;
SELECT shard_name, partition_key FROM shards WHERE shard_id > 5 ORDER BY shard_name DESC;
SELECT shard_id, shard_name, shard_location FROM shards WHERE partition_key BETWEEN 10 AND 20 ORDER BY shard_id ASC;
SELECT COUNT(shard_id) AS shard_count, MAX(partition_key) AS max_partition_key FROM shards WHERE shard_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100.00 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT email, username FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT user_id, count(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_orders > 3;
SELECT u.username, o.total_amount FROM users u INNER JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE o.total_amount > 100 ORDER BY o.total_amount DESC;
SELECT u.username, o.order_date FROM users u JOIN orders o ON u.user_id = o.user_id WHERE o.total_amount BETWEEN 50 AND 200 ORDER BY o.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT username, created_at FROM users ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY total_amount ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM orders GROUP BY user_id;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders WHERE user_id = 2 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 10 AND 50;
SELECT * FROM orders o JOIN users u ON o.user_id = u.user_id WHERE u.username = 'Alice';
SELECT p.product_name, o.total_amount FROM orders o JOIN products p ON o.total_amount > p.price;
SELECT * FROM shards;
SELECT shard_id, shard_name FROM shards WHERE shard_id = 1;
SELECT part_id, part_name FROM data_part WHERE part_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, strategy_description FROM partitioning_strategies;
SELECT node_id, node_name, node_ip_address FROM storage_nodes WHERE node_name = 'Node1';
SELECT * FROM shards;
SELECT part_id, part_name FROM data_part ORDER BY part_id DESC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM partitioning_strategies WHERE strategy_id BETWEEN 1 AND 5;
SELECT node_name, node_ip_address FROM storage_nodes WHERE node_name = 'Node1';
SELECT shard_name, shard_id FROM shards JOIN data_part ON shards.shard_id = data_part.shard_id;
SELECT id, name, age FROM table1;
SELECT country, city FROM table2;
SELECT product_name, price FROM table3;
SELECT id, customer_name, address FROM table4;
SELECT order_id, product_id FROM table5;
SELECT name, age FROM table1;
SELECT city, country FROM table2 ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT * FROM table3 WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price ASC;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM table4 WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' ORDER BY customer_name;
SELECT order_id, product_id FROM table5 WHERE order_id = 100;
